dxf2img¶

Rasters (simple) .dxf files to bitmap images :requires: dxfgrabber and pil

bbox(layers=None, ignore=[])[source]¶
Parameters:
  • layers – list or dictionary of layers to draw. None = all layers
  • ignore – list of strings of entity types to ignore
Returns:

BBox bounding box of corresponding entities
img(size=[256, 256], border=5, box=None, layers=None, ignore=[], forcelayercolor=False, antialias=1, background='white')[source]¶
Parameters:
  • size – [x,y] max size of image in pixels. if one coord is None, the other one will be enforced
  • border – int border width in pixels
  • box – class:BBox bounding box. if None, box is calculated to contain all drawn entities
  • layers – list or dictionary of layers to draw. None = all layers
  • ignore – list of strings of entity types to ignore
Result :

PIL:Image rasterized image
